alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kenton; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:58PM EDT until July 02 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kenton County in northern Kentucky... Northeastern Grant County in northern Kentucky... Northwestern Pendleton County in northern Kentucky... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crittenden, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Butler, Greenwood, Morning View, Northcutt, Bracht, Gardnersville, Knoxville, Fiskburg, Gene Snyder Airport, Sherman and Piner. This includes I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 159 and 168. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
